job.title: System Engineer
job.description:
Job Title: System Engineer (Office 365, Powershell Scripting & Active Directory)

Location: San Jose, CA or PST/West Coast

Duration: 6 Months

 

Duties:

1. User Support and Development

- Two parts: Scripting automations and answering user ticket

2. Tickets can range from automation requests to assisting with O365 access.

 

Experience:

1. O365

2. Powershell Scripting

3. Active Directory

 

Nice to Have:

  1. OKTA
  2. Google Workspace
  3. Microsoft Technologies
  4. Working in Active Directory

 

Tools and Programs:

  1. O365 – Suite of Microsoft applications – Outlook, Excel, Word, etc.
  2. PowerShell Language for automation – Scripting
  3. Active Directory Experience .


 If you are interested, please share a good time and your number for a short discussion. Alternatively, you could share your updated resume at anosh.kumar@bayonesolutions.com or call me at (925) 218-2347. Looking forward to hearing from you!
